sentence: When the House decided to impanel a committee anyway, McCarthy proposed staffing it with people like Rep. Jim Jordan (R-Ohio), a Trump ally.
title: The Jan. 6 probe gets the ‘Russia hoax’ treatment

sentence: The Judiciary Committee, which under GOP control would be headed by Rep. Jim Jordan of Ohio, would focus on more than a dozen key issues, according to a draft obtained by the Times.
author: Susan Ferrechio
title: House GOP to seek unity at annual retreat, plot agenda for takeover of Congress

author: Matthew Boyle
title: Exclusive — Kevin McCarthy: Dozens of ‘Preservation Notices’ Being Sent Across Government, Setting Stage for GOP Investigative Clash with Biden After Midterms

sentence: Sitting Ohio Rep. Jim Jordan, a MAGA favorite, was once an assistant wrestling coach at Ohio State University in the 1990s.
author: Margaret Carlson
title: Republicans Are Clueless About Living in a Glass House
